## Add User Cooldowns to Channel Points
### Import Code
```

```
### Set up
This code will auto refund any action that is still in cooldown, you will just need to add a `Set Argument %rewardCooldown% to XX` XX is the time of cooldown in Seconds, then you need to add a method pointing to the newly imported code. It will look something like this.
![channelpointcooldown.png](/extensions/cooldowns/channelpointcooldown.png)


---
## Heat Cooldown
### Import Code
```

```
### Set up

 In any action you wish to add a Heat Cooldown to you will need to add the following actions at the top of the ation. More info on this can be found [HERE](/en/extensions/heat-map/heat-cooldown) 
![heatcooldown.png](/extensions/heat-map/images/heatcooldown.png)
